com.atakmap.android.resection

Class ResectionBearingDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.resection.ResectionBearingDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener

    public class ResectionBearingDialog
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    Fancy dialog for setting a bearing value All bearing inputs and outputs are in degrees true north This is tailored for the resection tool, but could potentially be used elsewhere
